alert.note: Alert for Lower St. Martin; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Mary (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 3:16PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Iberia and north central St. Mary Parishes through 345 PM CDT... At 316 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Charenton, or 7 miles north of Franklin, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Franklin, Jeanerette, Baldwin, Sorrel, Glencoe and Charenton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Lower St. Martin; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Mary
